Idham Azis: Tangkap Santoso Tak Takut, Jadi Kapolri Saya Gemetar
06 Nov 2019, 04:55 by Andita Rahma, Juli Hantoro
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Jenderal Idham Azis mengaku gemetar saat ditunjuk menjadi calon Kepala Kepolisian RI oleh Presiden Joko Widodo. Ia mengaku tak pernah mempersiapkan diri menjadi orang yang pintar memberikan sambutan atau pidato layaknya seorang pemimpin.
"Saya tak persiapkan diri saya menjadi orang ilmiah. Saya tangkap Santoso (pemimpin Mujahidin Indonesia Timur) berbulan-bulan tidak takut, tapi ditunjuk Kapolri saya gemetar," ujar Idham di Mako Brimob Polri, Kelapa Dua, Depok pada Rabu, 6 November 2019.
Idham pun mengulang kembali cerita bagaimana mulanya dia mengetahui dipilih menjadi calon Kapolri. Pada 22 Oktober 2019, ia diperintahkan untuk menghadap Jokowi di Istana Negara, Jakarta Pusat, sekitar pukul 13.00 WIB.
Ia lantas melapor ke Jenderal (Purn) Tito Karnavian. "Setelah menghadap Kapolri, saya bertemu dengan istri. Bismillah, saya berangkat," kata Idham.
Di Istana, dia melanjutkan kisahnya, Presiden Jokowi menanyakan kapan masa jabatan Idham Azis sebagai anggota kepolisian akan berakhir.
"Saya jawab, izin Pak Presiden, Februari 2021. Beliau bilang, ya sudah Bapak gantikan Pak Tito," kata Idham menirukan ulang obrolan saat itu.
Idham Azis kini telah mengemban tugas sebagai Kepala Kepolisian RI hingga masa pensiun mendatang, Februari 2021. Ia menggantikan Tito Karnavian yang diberhentikan karena menjadi Menteri Dalam Negeri di kabinet Joko Widodo-Ma'ruf Amin.

Idham Azis: Arrest Santoso, Not Afraid, So My Police Chief Shakes
Nov 6 2019, 04:55 by Andita Rahma, Juli Hantoro
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - General Idham Azis said he was shaken when he was appointed as a candidate for the Indonesian Police Chief by President Joko Widodo. He claimed never to prepare himself to be a person who is good at giving speeches or speeches like a leader.
"I did not prepare myself to become a scientific person. I arrested Santoso (leader of the Mujahidin of Eastern Indonesia) for months without fear, but appointed by the National Police Chief I trembled," Idham said at the Police Mobile Brigade Mako, Kelapa Dua, Depok on Wednesday, November 6, 2019.
Idham also repeated the story of how he had initially been chosen to be a candidate for the National Police. On October 22, 2019, he was ordered to face Jokowi at the State Palace, Central Jakarta, at around 13:00 West Indonesia Time.
He then reported to General (Ret) Tito Karnavian. "After facing the National Police Chief, I met my wife. Bismillah, I left," Idham said.
At the Palace, he continued his story, President Jokowi asked when Idham Azis's tenure as a police officer would end.
"I answered, the President's permission, February 2021. He said, yes, you have replaced Mr. Tito," said Idham mimicking the conversation at that time.
Idham Azis has now assumed the task of Chief of the Indonesian Police until the next retirement period, February 2021. He replaces Tito Karnavian who was dismissed for being Interior Minister in the cabinet of Joko Widodo-Ma'ruf Amin.
